altername_name: SuperLite Gold Series - Minna no Shougi - Joukyuu Hen
name: SuperLite Gold Series: Minna no Shougi: Joukyuu-hen
overview: SuperLite Gold Series - Minna no Shougi - Joukyuu hen (Advanced Class) is a shogi game designed specially for advanced shogi players. The game features 2 different game modes: - Shogi Course Mode: In this mode the player has the supervision and advice of Mr Kunio Yonaga and Masayoshi Yonsei and with his advices get the 6th grade in the shogi league. - Game Mode: Play shogi games against computer or human opponents. The game features different difficulty levels from beginner to strongest, 3 different kind of boards, pieces & cursors.
